'''Mrs. Proudfoot''' was [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[The Shire]] who non-verbally chastises [[Everard Proudfoot|her husband]] for being amused by [[Gandalf]]'s firework antics. Mrs. Proudfoot was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]], where she was portrayed by [[Megan Edwards]].<ref>{{webcite|author=IMDb|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/name/nm1104283/|articlename=Megan Edwards - IMDb|dated=|website=https://www.imdb.com/|accessed=24 January 2024}}</ref>
